Text: What a load of shit!!, this is the free installer you get from the official site, which means it's not a cracked version, you still have to buy the credits to get the cards, 2 credits per card. I have an account with VirtuaGirl, & have almost 1000 cards, thought this might be a cracked version to use on, my torrent rig, this torrent is an EPIC FAIL.
